channel.title: Game window doesnt pop up
channel.description:
i think i set everything up correctly but when i click "run" on msi the smart code pops up but not the game window. and it says the script is running
:/

item.title: Game window doesnt pop up
item.dc:creator: @script_learner script learner
item.description:
@script_learner wrote:

[quote=“CodeBest, post:1, topic:443441”]i think i set everything up correctly but when i click “run” on msi the smart code pops up but not the game window. and it says the script is running

:/[/quote]
put this at the top of command list

begin
Activateclient;
wait(500);

Read full topic
